description:
A productivity add-in for Microsoft PowerPoint, Excel and Word.

Power-user is a productivity add-in for Microsoft PowerPoint, Excel and Word. It brings dozens of advanced features to save time and deliver attractive presentations:
- Access thousands of templates, icons, flags, maps, charts, pictures, logos and more from the Library
- Create robust links between Excel and PowerPoint to automate reports
- Clean your presentation from common mistakes in 1 click
- Create agenda pages automatically
- Easily align and manipulate shapes
- Clean Excel data and formula
- And a lot more!
- [Library] Fixed issue with Maps in Excel
- [Cleaner] Fixed minor issue
